title: 有沒有人知道tenda路由器如何開server
author: ChickenHung

replies.author: wangchujinqwe
replies.txt_content: 连这个路由器的名字都没听过。。

replies.author: Emerson
replies.txt_content: 一律都是/stop关服..或者.hold关服...
